CommandDefinition.Name: callservice
CommandDefinition.Description: Directly call a service (encapsulated by a trivial workflow).

Argument.Name: pathToParameterFile
Argument.Description: The path to the parameter file containing the service identification and the corresponding input parameters

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application containing the service.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application containing the service.
